name: angle_from_to_number
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool unitconversion.
Tool description: App to easily convert units
API description: Converts an angle measurement from one unit to another using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

number.description: The angle measurement value to be converted.

is_from.description: The unit of the input angle measurement (e.g., 'degrees').

to.description: The unit to convert the angle measurement to (e.g., 'radians').
